data.name: Gears of Phantasm: Destiny Tailored(DLC-1)
data.detailed_description:
A Optional upgrade for content to Purchase.
This will be considered the complete version.
The free to play base game is a beta version.
Features the below enhancements for game.
^Updated, Dashed Out Early Access Content.

(1.)Double Mode ~ Acts As Developer Mode.
(A.)New Game Option to play a Easier Mode.
(B.)Automatic Combos, & Double EXP/GOLD.
(C.)Rare Loot, Unique Battle Class for Knight.
(D.)Treasure Pouch(Hold 5000$)Early Shops.
(E.)1,000 Starting Silver, & some other stuff.
This also includes other cut content/updates.
Refer to Early Access List on the base game.

Moving DLC Content to Base Game, September 1st.
DLC will now contain the Alpha for ACT II of Game.
^This will unlock over time, for anyone wanting to
test out content early. Check monthly for updates.

The Act I Content from DLC1 with still contain new
Side Quests made that'll slowly port to base game.
This will consist of any major free Side DLC as well.

data.short_description: (Directors-Cut Includes everything from base/demo game & cut content/future updates)

fullgame.name: Gears of Phantasm: Destiny Tailored(Act I)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7~11, Possibly Vista & XP.
  • Processor: 8th Intel I3(3.0GHZ) or Better.
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8th Intel I3(Integrated) or Better.
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java will be Installed. Graphics MB=System Paged up to 2GB with Updates.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
